abstract: The William Morris Agency is joining Silicon Valley venture capital firms Accel Partners and Venrock to invest in digital media start-up companies.
snippet: The William Morris Agency is joining Silicon Valley venture capital firms Accel Partners and Venrock to invest in digital media start-up companies.
lead_paragraph: Hollywood and Silicon Valley have something of a Mars/Venus problem: the two sides are talking but they don’t speak each other’s language. A new venture involving a phone company may just add Pluto into the mix.

headline.main: Hollywood, Silicon Valley and AT&T? It’s a Deal
headline.print_headline: Hollywood, Silicon Valley And AT&T? It’s a Deal
